Name: WHERE IS A TOILET!?
About the game: ABOUT GAME Have you have ever been in this situation? Suddenly, you feel like something big and get stomachache. Fortunately, you find a public toilet in the distance! Run and run! ' WHERE IS A TOILET!? ' is a game about the man who in this problematic situation.On the journey to the Toilet, ordinary people, such as children playing with water, villagers jogging, and idol enthusiasts, can become villains.Get to the toilet for save your face! GAME FEATURES Where is A Toilet!? is a running-platformer game. it's a game when you running to the toilet avoiding obstacles. VARIOUS ENEMIES On the journey to the Toilet, there are variety villains. the maps are located randomly. Beat out them and reach to the Toilet. COMBO SYSTEM Beat out the villains through stomp, you get a combo bonus. Combo bonus can give you faster and invincible. Get more combo and get to the Toilet faster! ENJOY WITH LOCAL-MULTIPLAYER You can enjoy the ' WHERE IS A TOILET!? ' through two player with one keyboard, or one keyboard and one gamepad. Who will get a glorious honor go into the Toilet.
